td.content: Soft tissue swelling with periosteal new-bone formation

observation.value: Soft tissue swelling with periosteal new-bone formation

td.content: s:66 YO white F retired presents with moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments x 3 weeks. patient also complains of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 72.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed famcyclovir - 500 mg 3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:a 66 yr old F retired presents with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. she has history of moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 69.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Buspirone - 15 mg /day, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

s:patient with C/O moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture, moderate fever and moderate denial of any trauma. pt is a 66 year old white F retired. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 70.9 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.

s:patient presents with 5 months history of moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture, moderate fever and moderate denial of any trauma. patient is a 66 year old f retired. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking o:Height 166 cm, Weight 69.4 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.

s:66 year old white f with moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests and moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. she has had several such episodes over past 2 years. ocas ETOH on w/e pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 167 cm, Weight 71.6 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

content2.Unmatched: ocas ETOH on w/e pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily

td.content: s:a 67 yo white f presents with 3 days history of moderate feelings of apprehension when taking tests. pt also reports moderate sudden onset of extreme anxiety, tremulousness and sweating immediately before public appearances. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 72 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 16 a:Anxiety p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered GAD - 7 Assessment Tool.

content2.Unmatched: pt also reports moderate sudden onset

td.content: s:pt presents with 2 years history of moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear. she is a 67 yo f retired. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 71.6 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed prednisone - 60 mg daily, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

s:patient presents with moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture, moderate denial of any trauma and moderate fever for 4 days. she has a history of Sickle Cell Anemia for past 3 years. pt is a 67 YO female retired. o:Height 166 cm, Weight 69.6 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to hematology.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
